title: 08/23 Fantasy Football Podcast: Live Mock Draft!
description:
Follow along as we do a 12-team, 0.5 PPR draft with listeners! With recent news on Le'Veon Bell and Odell Beckham, you won't have to wait long to see where they get drafted. When would we consider moving Beckham behind a few other WRs in the rankings (3:00)? ... Rookie RBs start coming off the board beginning in late Round 2 (9:30), but you may be surprised by the order. Check out the TE run a few rounds later (25:00) ... Of course we talk strategy as Jamey and another owner didn't select an RB until Round 5. Heath likes Paul Perkins over Mike Gillislee (27:50). When should Darren Sproles get drafted (39:06)? And is Keenan Allen's schedule being overlooked (46:20)? ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
